company_name: PT. Gunung Ansa (Harris Vertu & Yello Hotels Harmoni)
recommended_degree: Administrasi, Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Psikologi, Pengelolaan Perhotelan, Manajemen Perhotelan (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Responsibilities:
Assist with recruitment tasks: posting jobs, screening resumes, scheduling interviews.
Support onboarding and offboarding processes.
Maintain employee records and update HR databases.
Help organize training, employee engagement activities, and HR events.
Assist with HR documentation, reports, and administrative tasks.
